shortdesc.ph: Used to set the position and size ratio of the watermark on the screen.

ul.li: xRatio and yRatio represent the coordinates of the top-left corner of the watermark and determine its horizontal and vertical distance relative to the top-left corner of the screen.
widthRatio represents the width of the watermark. The SDK calculates the height proportionally based on this value to maintain image integrity.

plentry.pd: The x-coordinate of the top-left corner of the watermark. Represents the horizontal position relative to the top-left corner of the screen. Range: [0.0, 1.0]. Default is 0.
The y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the watermark. Represents the vertical position relative to the top-left corner of the screen. Range: [0.0, 1.0]. Default is 0.
The width of the watermark. The SDK calculates the height proportionally based on this value to maintain image integrity. Range: [0, 1]. Default is 0, which means the watermark is not displayed.
